message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This seems like a fair starting point considering the inflation working against you. Let's try to settle this quickly.

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm sticking with my original offer of 60/40.  You're losing significant value with each round.  Take the deal!
